item.title: neve
Homepage
item.content:encoded:
The best Ethnic Cusine is served here

Join us and enjoy your dinner in a friendly environment full of friendly people and beautiful Ethnic dishes.

Our Menu

Come visit us at the centre of the city!

21 Jump Street. New York City

0030 728772

Todays Menu

Our chef is preparing fresh dishes every day, check what is in the menu today!

Our Menu

Vegan friendly pasta with Rice Noodles

$ 23,33

A great plate with healthy ingredients, suitable for vegans too.

Rib Steak with Spicy herbs sauce and onions

$ 30,00

A great plate with healthy ingredients, suitable for vegans too.

  • ...I just love being and having dinner there for all the reasons you imagine! Awesome restaurant! Great customer service and quality!...

    JANE DONSON

Our photo gallery

Get inspired and get ready!

[gallery columns="4" size="full" ids="139,140,141,142,143,196,145,146"]

Follow us on social for exclusive offers!

Get exclusive deals, offers and rewards!

Make a Reservation

Book your table by using the form below

Contact information

Address

Brancusi 105,
6511 Bucharest

Contact

Tel: 012 317 14 23
reserve@neve.com

Serving Hours

Monday 11:00 AM 12:00 PM
Tuesday 11:00 AM 12:00 PM
Wednesday 11:00 AM 12:00 PM
Thursday 11:00 AM 12:00 PM
Friday 11:00 AM 12:00 PM
Saturday Closed
Sunday Closed

item.title: Our restaurant
item.content:encoded:
Our Restaurant

A relaxing place in the heart of the city!

A place with a history worth sharing!

Celebrate your every day dining in beautiful atmosphere of our restaurant. Exquisite & creative cousine, friendly atmosphere and highly professional staff will make your special day beautiful & enjoyable.

Customers love our Restaurant

10 years of experience and practice

  • ... I love this restaurant. Quite my type of food and awesome service. Quality is fantastic, prices are reasonable and staff very friendly. Recommended!

    JOHN DOSH

  • ...I just love being and having dinner there for all the reasons you imagine! Awesome restaurant! Great customer service and quality!...

    GEORGE ANISTON

Weddings & Events

Celebrate your special day in beautiful atmosphere of our restaurant. Exquisite & creative cousine, friendly atmosphere and highly professional staff will make your special day beautiful & enjoyable.

Our Menu

Follow us on social for exclusive offers!

Get exclusive deals, offers and rewards!
